TEST_NAME: Redwood Regions should be correctly styled
QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (select case when  appr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
                         then case when appr.template not in ('Blank with Attributes', 'Blank with Attributes (No Grid)')
                                   then 'SMARTFILTER_TEMPLATE'
                                    end
                         when appr.icon_css_classes like 'fa-%'
                         then 'RGWRONGICONLIB'
                         end child_code,
                    aap.page_template, 
                    appr.application_id, 
                    appr.page_id, 
                    appr.display_position, 
                    appr.region_id component_id, 
                    appr.last_updated_by, 
                    appr.last_updated_on,
                    appr.region_name,
                    case when appr.source_type = 'Breadcrumb'
                         then 'Page Header'
                         when appr.source_type = 'Smart Filters'
                         then 'Smart Filters & Search'
                         when appr.template = 'Dialog'
                         then 'Dialogs, Drawers and Popups'
						 						 when appr.template = 'Page Header'
                         then 'Page Header'
                         end correct_position,
                    appr.template,
                    appr.icon_css_classes,
						        appr.workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions appr
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on appr.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                 and appr.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and aa.theme_number = 1000
            )
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
        std.application_id, 
        std.page_id,
        null created_by, 
        null created_on, 
        std.last_updated_by, 
        std.last_updated_on, 
        case when std.child_code is not null
             then apex_string.format('Region `%0` (page %1, app %2) %3', 
                            p0 => std.region_name, 
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.application_id,
                            p3 => case when std.child_code = 'SMARTFILTER_TEMPLATE'
                                       then 'has a template of `'||std.template||'` - it should be `Blank with Attributes`'
                                       when std.child_code = 'RGWRONGICONLIB'
                                       then 'is using a `Universal Theme` icon (`'||std.icon_css_classes||'` - it should use a `Redwood` icon'
                                       end
                         ) 
             end validation_failure_message, 
        case when std.child_code is not null
             then apex_string.format('Region `%0` (page %1, app %2) %3', 
                            p0 => std.region_name, 
                            p1 => std.page_id,
                            p2 => std.application_id,
                            p3 => case when std.child_code = 'SMARTFILTER_TEMPLATE'
                                       then 'has an incorrect template'
                                       when std.child_code = 'RGWRONGICONLIB'
                                       then 'has an invalid icon'
                                       end
                         ) 
             end issue_title,
        std.child_code,
        std.page_template, 
        std.display_position,
        std.region_name,
        std.correct_position,
        std.template,
        std.component_id,
        null parent_component_id,
        std.icon_css_classes,
				std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION:
Redwood regions are correctly styled (Smart filter regions should have a `Blank with Attributes` template) : \* RGWRONGICONLIB : You cannot use a ‘Universal Theme’ icon.

*   SMARTFILTER\_TEMPLATE : Smart Filter regions should have a template type of \`Blank with Attributes\`
FIX:
*   RGWRONGICONLIB : You must use a \`Redwood\` icon
*   SMARTFILTER\_TEMPLATE : Change the region template to \`Blank with Attributes\`
